arStrings.szText: {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to fire an arrow that bounces off walls and scenery. Hitting enemies from behind with {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} will make them {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
